title: Create Presentation Layer Library Generator Schema

groupingFolder.description: The grouping folder that the library will be created in

strict.description: Makes the library have stricter type checking and build optimization options

enableIvy.description: Makes the library have ivy enabled in tsconfig.lib.prod.json. Should not be used with publishable libraries.

prefix.description: Prefix to use for the selector. If nothing is passed, the domain grouping folder will be used

addJestJunitReporter.description: Whether to add the jest junit reporter to the jest config
